QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, odf_ca_clr_capacity.id odf_pk, odf_ca_clr_capacity.vsm_allocation_pct as vsm_allocation_pct, odf_ca_clr_capacity.code as code, odf_parent_id.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_parent_id.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, odf_ca_clr_capacity.vsm_capacity_type as vsm_capacity_type, (select audit_tmplt_created.full_name from (select full_name, user_id from srm_resources) audit_tmplt_created where audit_tmplt_created.user_id = odf_ca_clr_capacity.created_by) as created_by, odf_parent_id.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, (select audit_tmplt_updated.full_name from (select full_name, user_id from srm_resources) audit_tmplt_updated where audit_tmplt_updated.user_id = odf_ca_clr_capacity.last_updated_by) as updated_by, odf_ca_clr_capacity.name as name, odf_ca_clr_capacity.odf_parent_id as odf_parent_id, odf_ca_clr_capacity.created_date as created_date, odf_ca_clr_capacity.partition_code as partition_code, odf_ca_clr_capacity.last_updated_date as last_updated_date, odf_ca_clr_capacity.odf_cncrt_parent_id as odf_cncrt_parent_id, odf_parent_id.entity as odf_entity_code from odf_ca_clr_capacity odf_ca_clr_capacity, (select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, inv_investments.id odf_pk, odf_ca_inv.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, odf_ca_inv.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, inv_investments.entity_code as entity, odf_ca_inv.odf_period_end as odf_period_end from inv_investments inv_investments, odf_ca_inv odf_ca_inv where 1 = 1 and inv_investments.id = odf_ca_inv.id) odf_parent_id where 1 = 1 and odf_ca_clr_capacity.odf_parent_id = odf_parent_id.odf_pk
